title: FC Barcelona, World of Women Reveal 'Empowerment' Soccer NFT Auction
description: The Spanish soccer icon's latest NFT play is artwork inspired by women's club captain Alexia Putellas, with real-world perks for the buyer.

title: Exodus integrates Sovryn stablecoin with wallet; adds asset to its $100M treasury
description:
Crypto wallet provider Exodus said June 22 that it is adding the Sovryn Dollar (DLLR) to its corporate treasury and user wallets. Exodus adds DLLR stablecoin to treasury Exodus CEO and Co-Founder JP Richardson said: “Besides taking its place on our corporate balance sheet, the Sovryn Dollar asset will soon be available to all of […]

The post Exodus integrates Sovryn stablecoin with wallet; adds asset to its $100M treasury appeared first on CryptoSlate.
